entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
